title: How to Fold a Napkin Into a Diamond Pouch

steps.headline: Fold the napkin into fourths.
steps.description: To do so, fold it in half, then fold it in half again.

steps.headline: Take a sheet of the napkin and fold it over to meet the corners of the opposite side.
steps.description: Fold it over about an inch away from the corner, like the image shoes.

steps.headline: Repeat the last step for two more sheets.
Fold each side over to the middle like the image shoes.
Flip it over and put silverware in.

text: Fold the napkin into fourths. To do so, fold it in half, then fold it in half again. Take a sheet of the napkin and fold it over to meet the corners of the opposite side. Fold it over about an inch away from the corner, like the image shoes. Repeat the last step for two more sheets.  Flip the napkin over.  Fold each side over to the middle like the image shoes.  Flip it over and put silverware in.  Finished.
